Source code for test_load

from load_data import load_data
import numpy as np
import pytest
import unittest


tester = load_data('data.csv')



[docs]def test_format():

    matrix = np.loadtxt(open('data.csv'), delimiter=",", skiprows=1)
    dims = np.shape(matrix)
    assert dims[1] == 2
    assert type(tester) is tuple
    assert len(tester) == 2




[docs]def test_columns_full():

    assert tester[0] != []
    assert tester[1] != []



[docs]class MyTestCase(unittest.TestCase):

[docs]    def test_datatype(dtype):
        dtype.assertRaises(ValueError, load_data, 'hello')

        size.assertRaises(ValueError, load_data, 'onecol.csv')
